title: Hair Fall Remedy - Aloe + Onion
description: Mix aloe vera gel and onion juice. Apply twice a week.

title: Skin Glow - Turmeric + Honey + Milk
description: Make a paste of turmeric, honey and milk. Apply for 15 minutes.

title: Cold & Cough - Ginger Tea
description: Boil ginger with water, add honey and lemon before drinking.
